com.guitariffic.controller
Class TextAreaController

java.lang.Object
  com.guitariffic.controller.TextAreaController

public class TextAreaController
extends java.lang.Object

The controller for the text area component of the application. This class mediates between the text area model and the text area view in the MVC paradigm.

All manipulation of the text area component is handled by this class. The functions available to this class are spelled out in the BaseTextArea class. For example, this class can distinguish which type of text area is being used and apply the appropriate logic to manipulate it.

Version:
1.0, Nov 2011
Author:
Brian Collins
